title: Photon - vacuum and glass correct statement

content.prompt: A photon is initially in vacuum. Later, the photon is in glass. Which statement about the photon is correct?

choices.label: The speed of the photon is greater in vacuum than in glass.
The speed of the photon is the same in both vacuum and in glass.
The wavelength of the photon is less in vacuum than in glass.
The wavelength of the photon is the same in both vacuum and glass.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
